PAD_InteractingWithOrb.synopsis: The character voicing feeling the presence of Shar when interacting with a Sharran artefact used to gain Darkvision.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Since there is only one session provided ('PAD_InteractingWithOrb'), there are no other sessions to establish any ordering or exclusiveness constraints. Therefore, no ordering or exclusiveness rules apply.

PAD_InteractingWithOrb_0.speaker: Player
PAD_InteractingWithOrb_0.text: Something's off. Pure shadow - around me, inside me.
